EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2019.Istanbul Date Change
EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne Tour Istanbul Date Change
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for your expressed interest in attending SpringOne Tour Istanbul.
We are emailing to let you know that we have changed the date to April 25th - 26th, 2019. We hope that you can still attend!
If you have any other questions, please feel free to email SpringOneTour@pivotal.io <[[mailto:SpringOneTour@pivotal.io]]>.
Thank you for understanding, Tasha Isenberg and the SpringOne Tour Team
